pages.text: Ars Nouveau 1.8.0, Mana Berries! $(li)Adds Mana Berry Bushes$(li)Adds Mana Regeneration Potions$(li)Carbuncles will now forage for Mana Berries$(li)Adds the Void Jar$(li)Many new configs for mana regen$(li)Lava Lilies no longer burn you on Magma$(li)Carbuncles will now 'unstick' themselves when stuck.

$(li)Fixes curios stacking$(li)Fixes Harm not affecting dragons$(li)Fixes damage spells not dropping player items$(li)Fixes Conjure Water in the Nether$(li)Adds missing mana cost to Rune$(li)Fixes Volcanic Accumulator range$(li)Runic Chalk can now make any rune permanent.$(li)Updated plant textures
